body: @MrSaiwou Doujins.com is subscription-based translation group, so they are paid to do to translation. So it's not really insane or anything, they didn't do it for free.
Someone was insane enough to translate 150 pages, congrats

Fuck the stupid ass parents dying comments. If you're reading this, you are immune from all of these shitty copy-pasted comments forever. Hell, I hereby bless your parents with 10 years of luck. There, copy-paste that.
lmao glutton boy ending killed me
